post_text:
Our Windham High School C.O.R.E. Program (Community, Occupational, & Remote Education) students have been so focused and driven this week! C.O.R.E. offers individualized academic support and instruction to help students be successful academically, socially, behaviorally, vocationally, and with their independent living skills. In addition to academic instruction, students in C.O.R.E. also work to establish vocational placements in the community.
Thank you, everyone, for a great first week of school!
---
¡Nuestros estudiantes en el Programa C.O.R.E. (Educación Comunitaria, Ocupacional, & Remota, en inglés) han estado muy concentrados y motivados esta semana! C.O.R.E. ofrece instrucción y apoyo académico individualizado para ayudar a los estudiantes a tener éxito académico, social, conductual, vocacional, y con sus habilidades para la vida independiente. Además de la instrucción académica, los estudiantes de C.O.R.E. también trabajan para establecer colocaciones vocacionales en la comunidad.
¡Gracias a todos por una gran primera semana de clases!

post_text:
First day of school is tomorrow, Tuesday, September 8. Please drive carefully because school buses will be on the road, and students will be crossing streets and be on the sidewalks. Thank you Willimantic Police Department for the support.
--- https://www.windhamps.org/apps/pages/reopening
El primer día de clases es mañana el martes 8 de septiembre. Por favor guíe con cuidado porque los autobuses escolares estarán en las carreteras, y los estudiantes estarán cruzando las calles y estarán en las aceras. Gracias al Departamento de Policía de Willimantic por el apoyo.
shared_text:
Willimantic Police Department
September 4 at 1:44 PM ·

The school season has begun and although there may be more stringent restrictions regarding social distancing and other precautions, there will certainly be a significant increase in pedestrian and vehicular traffic throughout the city, particularly in the areas that surround our schools.

To name a few, Willimantic has elementary and secondary schools on Main Street, Quarry Street, Milk Street, High Street and Ash Street. Additionally, Eastern Connecticut State University will be back in session which will significantly increase the travelers on the roadways and sidewalks.

Our School Resource Officer (SRO) is dedicated to the safety and well-being of all of our students in this great community. He is also a very useful resource for the teachers and staff at the schools for advice, training and as a sounding board.

Please help us and our students by driving safely and cautiously.

Just drive through and pick up a backpack loaded with free school supplies. We’ll see you at Rec Park from 10AM-1PM!
---

Simplemente conduzca y recoja una mochila cargada con materiales escolares gratis. ¡Los veremos en Rec Park de 10AM-1PM!

shared_text:
Essential Superheroes is at Windham Public Schools.
August 22 at 11:40 PM · Willimantic, CT ·

Dear Windham Public Schools staff, admins, and support teams.

With all the noise right now about reopening plans, it may be tough for our educational #EssentialSuperheroes to hear the messages of love! We wanted to make sure you heard the message that, "We thank you for your service."

post_text:
Dr. Youngberg updated the Windham Board of Education Wednesday evening on the school reopening plan in the Board's first live meeting since March. Staff and members of the public raised questions and concerns, and the Board also had the opportunity to pose questions and receive clarification. View the entire meeting on YouTube. (Dr. Youngberg's presentation starts at about 55 minutes into the meeting.)
--- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RZHKzEs_ZWg
La Dra. Youngberg actualizó a la Junta de Educación de Windham el miércoles por la noche sobre el plan de reapertura de la escuela en la primera reunión en vivo de la Junta desde marzo. El personal y los miembros del público plantearon preguntas e inquietudes, y la Junta también tuvo la oportunidad de formular preguntas y recibir aclaraciones. Vea toda la reunión en YouTube. (La presentación de la Dra. Youngberg comienza aproximadamente a los 55 minutos).

This is a reminder that tomorrow, Friday August 14, is the last day for Free Summer Meals. We’ve served 42,000 meals this summer – that’s almost a 75% increase over last year! Thank you to our wonderful Food Services staff for making sure our kiddos are well fed!

Hemos servido 42,000 comidas este verano – ¡eso es casi un aumento de 75% más el año pasado! ¡Gracias a nuestro maravilloso personal de Servicios de Alimentos por asegurarse de que nuestros niños estén bien alimentaditos!

post_text:
(1/2)
Students in Ms. Vera’s Virtual Bilingual Summer School class have been reading about community jobs. They’ve been studying a lot about firefighters. Last week, the class was surprised with a special guest visit, and students were eager to ask questions and share with him what they’ve been learning! Thank you to Town of Coventry Fire EMS for lending us one of your best!
---
Los estudiantes de la clase de Escuela Bilingüe de Verano Virtual de la Sra. Vera han estado leyendo sobre trabajos comunitarios. Han estado estudiando mucho sobre los bomberos. ¡La semana pasada, la clase fue sorprendida con una visita especial, y los estudiantes estaban ansiosos por hacer preguntas y por compartir con él lo que han estado aprendiendo! ¡Gracias a los Bomberos de Coventry por prestarnos uno de sus mejores!

post_text:
Today was the last day of summer school! As budding entomologists, Ms. Miller’s class went on a virtual field trip to the Victoria Bug Zoo Inc. to see many critters that they’ve explored and studied in their unit, including grasshoppers, stick bugs, beetles, tarantulas, and more. What a memorable way to end an amazing online summer class!
---
¡Hoy fue el último día de la escuela de verano! Como entomólogos aprendices, la clase de la Sra. Miller tuvo un viaje de campo virtual al Zoológico Victoria Bug para ver muchos de los insectos que han explorado y estudiado en su unidad, incluyendo saltamontes, insectos hoja, escarabajos, tarántulas, y más. ¡Qué manera memorable de terminar una increíble clase de verano en línea!
text:
Today was the last day of summer school! What a memorable way to end an amazing online summer class!
---
¡Hoy fue el último día de la escuela de verano! Como entomólogos aprendices, la clase de la Sra. Miller tuvo un viaje de campo virtual al Zoológico Victoria Bug para ver muchos de los insectos que han explorado y estudiado en su unidad, incluyendo saltamontes, insectos hoja, escarabajos, tarántulas, y más. ¡Qué manera memorable de terminar una increíble clase de verano en línea!

post_text:
These amazing students are bugging out during summer school! They have become buzzing entomologists as they learn to study all kinds of bugs. This week they learned lots of amazing (and icky, for some!) facts about bees and how they grow. During independent reading time, they are extending their learning by reading about other bugs, too. They have beeeeeen superstars and we are very proud of their efforts as summer school zooms by!
---
¡Estos estudiantes increíbles se están divirtiendo durante la escuela de verano! Se han convertido en entomólogos a medida que aprenden a estudiar todos tipos de insectos. Esta semana aprendieron muchos datos sorprendentes (¡y asquerosos, para algunos!) sobre las abejas y cómo crecen. Durante el tiempo de lectura independiente, también amplían su aprendizaje al leer sobre otros insectos. ¡Han sido superestrellas y estamos muy orgullosos de sus esfuerzos mientras la escuela de verano continúa!

post_text:
Virtual Summer School is almost halfway through! What have classes been up to in Kindergarten-Grade 3 Literacy Summer School? Besides enjoying their class morning meetings, students and teachers are having fun reading ARC Bookshelf books during 1-on-1 reading conferences, and are loving working together on reading comprehension worksheets during reading conferences. We are #WindhamProud of these young dedicated workers!
---
¡La Escuela Virtual de Verano está casi a la mitad! ¿Qué han estado haciendo las clases en la Escuela de Verano de Alfabetización de Kindergarten-Grado 3? Además de disfrutar de sus reuniones matutinas en clase, los estudiantes y los maestros se divierten leyendo libros de ARC Bookshelf durante las conferencias de lectura 1-a-1, y están gozando trabajando juntos en las hojas de trabajo de comprensión de lectura durante las conferencias de lectura. ¡Tenemos #OrgulloWindham de estos jovenes trabajadores dedicados!

Windham Center School Natchaug School North Windham School W.B. Sweeney Elementary School

post_text:
We hope everyone enjoyed their holiday weekend! If you haven’t yet, celebrate Independence Day by completing the Census – It's safe, it's easy, and it's important! This week is a good time to jump online and complete your census at my2020census.gov.

---

¡Esperamos que todos hayan disfrutado su fin de semana feriado! Si aún no lo han hecho, celebren el Día de la Independencia completando el Censo – ¡Es seguro, es fácil, y es importante! Esta semana es un buen momento para ir en línea a completar su censo en my2020census.gov.
shared_text:
U.S. Census Bureau
July 4 at 11:00 AM ·

Independence Day and the census go together like apple pie and ice cream. We’ve been conducting the count for 230 years—almost as long as our country has existed! To learn more about the #2020Census, visit 2020CENSUS.GOV.
text:
We hope everyone enjoyed their holiday weekend! If you haven’t yet, celebrate Independence Day by completing the Census – It's safe, it's easy, and it's important! This week is a good time to jump online and complete your census at my2020census.gov.

---

¡Esperamos que todos hayan disfrutado su fin de semana feriado! Si aún no lo han hecho, celebren el Día de la Independencia completando el Censo – ¡Es seguro, es fácil, y es importante! Esta semana es un buen momento para ir en línea a completar su censo en my2020census.gov.

U.S. Census Bureau
July 4 at 11:00 AM ·

Independence Day and the census go together like apple pie and ice cream. We’ve been conducting the count for 230 years—almost as long as our country has existed! To learn more about the #2020Census, visit 2020CENSUS.GOV.

post_text: If you want to tune in to watch the Windham High School Commencement Ceremony this evening, you can watch it on Channel 194, or click on the youTube link below.
shared_text:
Windham High School
June 16 at 2:10 PM ·

Hello Windham High School Families!
We are looking forward to our 146th Commencement Ceremony tomorrow evening. You may view the ceremony on You Tube and also on Spectrum Channel 194 at 6:00 pm. The You Tube link is posted on our Windham Public Schools website: https://youtu.be/cw_x2eJoCvU Our graduates may come to Windham High School to receive their diplomas from 4:00-5:30 pm and again after the ceremony at 7:15 pm. Graduates,if your last name begins with A-L, please come from 4:00 or 7:15 pm. If your last name begins with M-Z, please come at 4:30 pm or 7:45 pm. When you come to receive your diploma, please enter through the student lot entrance on High Street. If you have a Chromebook, please return it tomorrow evening.
Congratulations Class of 2020!

https://whs.windhamps.org/apps/pages/grads

post_text:
Class of 2020 Senior Randy Rodriguez clipped thank you cards for Windham High School teachers around campus. Randy says that WHS teachers have worked hard to help him become successful, and have taught him many basic skills to help prepare him for the future. Thank you for appreciating your teachers – they’re going to miss you too! We are #WhippetProud!
---
El estudiante de grado 12 de la Clase de 2020, Randy Rodriguez, colocó tarjetas de agradecimiento para los maestros de la Escuela Superior de Windham por el campus. Randy dice que los maestros de WHS han trabajado arduamente para ayudarlo a tener éxito, y le han enseñado muchas habilidades básicas para ayudarlo a prepararse para el futuro. Gracias por apreciar a tus maestros – ¡ellos también te extrañarán! ¡Tenemos #OrgulloWhippet!

NWS 5th Grade Graduation
text:
North Windham School hosted its Grade 5 Promotion Ceremony last evening. Best wishes to all those 5th graders moving on to Windham Middle School next year! Your North Windham School experiences have set you on a path for success in middle school!
---
La Escuela North Windham tuvo su Ceremonia de Promoción de Grado 5 anoche. ¡Nuestros mejores deseos para todos los estudiantes de 5º grado que irán a la Escuela Intermedia de Windham el próximo año! ¡Sus experiencias en la Escuela North Windham los han puesto en el camino para éxito en la escuela intermedia!

YOUTUBE.COM
NWS 5th Grade Graduation

Thanks to Stop & Shop seed-starting kits are being distributed until 10 AM today near the Windham High School Food Services distribution station. Thanks to the Family Liaisons Angela Rivera-Ayala, Linette Pineiro, and John Bello for joining Suzanne Lotocki from Stop & Shop to distribute these today. Be sure to stop by and pick one up for your child!
---

Gracias a los Enlaces de Familias Angela Rivera-Ayala, Linette Pineiro, y John Bello por acompañar a Suzanne Lotocki de Stop & Shop para distribuirlos hoy. ¡Asegúrese de pasar y recoger uno para su estudiante!

On Thursday, June 11, during the breakfast and lunch distribution at Windham High School from 8-10 AM, Stop & Shop representatives will be distributing free seed starter kits for children – vegetables, flowers, herbs. What a great project – stop by and pick one up! Thank you to Stop & Shop for this generous donation for our families!
---

post_text:
Are you ready for some fun? All Windham students are invited to take a break from Schooling at Home on Monday, June 1 for Virtual Field Day! Be sure you take a photo or a video of yourself participating, and send it along to your school. Put on your sneakers, head outside, and enjoy these exciting challenges. Ready? On your mark, get set, GO!
---
¿Estás listo para divertirte? ¡Todos los estudiantes de Windham están invitados a tomar un descanso de Educación en el Hogar el lunes 1 de junio para el Día de Campo Virtual! Asegúrese de tomar una foto o un video de ti mismo participando y envíelo a su escuela. Póngase sus zapatillas de deporte, salga afuera, y disfrute de estos emocionantes retos. ¿Están preparados? ¡En sus marcas, listos, fuera!

Natchaug School W.B. Sweeney Elementary School North Windham School Windham Middle School Windham Center School Charles H. Barrows STEM Academy Windham High School

post_text:
The Board of Finance approved a 1.3% budget increase this evening for a total of $48,599,744 for the 2020-21 Board of Education Budget. There will be no budget referendum this year. Thank you to those parents, staff, and community members who called in or emailed to the Board of Finance in support of appropriately funding Windham Schools for Windham children.
--- https://www.windhamps.org/apps/pages/financialinfo
La Junta de Finanzas aprobó un aumento al presupuesto de 1.3% esta noche para un total de $48,599,744 para el Presupuesto de la Junta de Educación para 2020-21. No habrá referéndum presupuestario este año. Gracias a aquellos padres, personal, y miembros de la comunidad que llamaron o enviaron un correo electrónico a la Junta de Finanzas en apoyo de financiar adecuadamente las Escuelas de Windham para los niños de Windham.

W.B. Sweeney Elementary School student Vanessa Spragg, who recited the Pledge of Allegiance this morning for us, also honored Memorial Day in her content lesson this week by painting the American Flag. Color us impressed!
---
La estudiante de la Escuela Sweeney, Vanessa Spragg, quien recitó el Juramento a la Bandera esta mañana por nosotros, también honró el Día de los Caídos en su lección de contenido esta semana al pintar la Bandera Americana. ¡Colorearnos impresionados!

post_text:
(4/6)
Normally, Windham High School, Windham Middle School, and Charles H. Barrows STEM Academy Bands perform at the Memorial Day Ceremony in town. Here to honor the spirit of Memorial Day is Windham High School Senior Autumn Cherie Reed singing our national anthem, “The Star-Spangled Banner.” Congratulations to this very talented graduating Senior!
---
Normalmente, las bandas de la Escuela Superior de Windham, la Escuela Intermedia de Windham, y la Academia STEM C. H. Barrows tocan en la ceremonia del Día de los Caídos en el pueblo. Aquí, para honrar el espíritu del Día de los Caídos, está el estudiante de grado 12 de la Escuela Superior de Windham, Autumn Cherie Reed, cantando nuestro himno nacional, “La Bandera Estrellada.” ¡Felicitaciones a esta talentosa estudiante graduanda!

post_text:
A great community partner, Windham/Willimantic CARES will be distributing free masks on Monday at Windham High School from 2-4 PM. If your family is in need of masks, this is a great opportunity to pick some up safely!
---
Un gran socio comunitario, Windham/Willimantic CARES, distribuirá máscaras gratuitas el lunes en la Escuela Superior de Windham de 2-4 PM. Si su familia necesita máscaras, ¡esta es una gran oportunidad para recoger algunas de manera segura!
shared_text:
Windham/Willimantic CARES
May 20 at 9:32 AM ·

This Monday, Memorial Day, we will be giving masks away at Windham High School from 2-4pm. We wanted to do in neighborhoods but safety concerns did not make this possible.

Cars preferred but will do some walk ups....Cars roll down back window and we will place in your car.

These masks are from Masks for CT. There are 5 in a bag...one bag per car.

If anyone would like to donate to the cause, you can do so by sending a check to Windham Town Hall, 979 Main St under our name....Windham Willimantic Cares....or go to our Venmo site. Thank you.

post_text:
Families who can use a little extra support might benefit from our friends at the Windham Area Interfaith Ministry's Neighbor Safety Net Fund. Please contact them if you need assistance with rent, an unexpected bill, or to stretch your grocery budget a bit. Also, the ACCESS Agency is offering grocery gift cards to families who need support, too.
---
Las familias que puedan utilizar un poco de apoyo adicional podrían beneficiarse de nuestros amigos en el Windham Area Interfaith Ministry's Neighbor Safety Net Fund. Comuníquese con ellos si necesita ayuda con el alquiler, una factura inesperada, o para estirar un poco su presupuesto de comidas. Además, la Agencia ACCESS está ofreciendo tarjetas de regalo para comidas a las familias que necesitan apoyo también.

post_text:
New York City-based Save the Music Foundation is highlighting North Windham School music Teacher Allison Rainwater for her efforts during Schooling at Home. She's working to keep music in the lives of her 450 students even when she's not with them at school. Thanks Ms. Rainwater!
---
La Fundación Save the Music, en la Ciudad de Nueva York, destaca a la maestra de música de la Escuela North Windham, Allison Rainwater, por sus esfuerzos durante Educación en el Hogar. Ella está trabajando para mantener la música en la vida de sus 450 estudiantes, invluyendo cuando no está con ellos en la escuela. ¡Gracias Sra. Rainwater!
shared_text:
Save The Music
April 24 at 10:25 AM ·

"We always save the music at North Windham School," says Ms. Rainwater, an elementary music teacher in Windham Public Schools in Connecticut and a 2019 Save The Music grant recipient.

She created her own music classroom on YouTube to stay connected with her students while they learn from home: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuq2I-8lL5rtxHttUBKPQZA. Quick tips from Ms. Rainwater to fellow music teachers:
- Don’t be afraid to make mistakes on camera - pretend it's just like your classroom.
- Promote yourself, you never know who will benefit from your videos.

The First Congregational Church of Willimantic will hand out food from the CT Mobile Food Pantry on Tuesday, April 28th at 12 noon, In the parking lot of St. Joseph Church, 99 Jackson St, Willimantic. For everyone's safety, this is a drive-thru event only, no walk-ins, please.

post_text:
What a great piece about Windham High School's senior hurdler Enrique Lopez Garcia in today's The Chronicle. Although he had high (and fast) hopes for his senior spring season, Enrique's talent is not diminished. It's clear that his extended coaching family have all supported a dedicated athlete in developing his own skills - another one of Windham High School's star Whippets!
---https://www.thechronicle.com/stories/20200417SCHOOLS.php
Este es un gran artículo sobre el corredor de obstáculos de grado 12 de la Escuela Superior de Windham, Enrique López García, en The Chronicle de hoy. Aunque tenía altas (y rápidas) esperanzas para su temporada de grado 12 de primavera, el talento de Enrique no disminuye. Está claro que su extensa familia de entrenadores han apoyado a un atleta dedicado a desarrollar sus propias habilidades, ¡otro de los Whippets destacados de la Escuela Superior de Windham!

post_text:
Thank you to Melody Wylie, paraprofessional at Windham High School for donating 25 handmade reusable protective face masks for Central Office staff members who have been working on site distributing free meals, Chromebooks, learning packets, cleaning our schools, and more during this unexpected school closure! Staying safe has never looked more fashionable – we will wear these with #WhippetPride!
---
¡Gracias a Melody Wylie, paraprofesional de la Escuela Superior de Windham por donar 25 máscaras faciales protectoras reutilizables hechas a mano para los miembros del personal de la Oficina Central que han estado trabajando en el sitio distribuyendo comidas gratis, Chromebooks, paquetes de aprendizaje, limpiando nuestras escuelas, y más durante este cierre escolar inesperado! Mantenerse seguro nunca ha sido tan en moda - ¡los usaremos con #OrgulloWhippet!

The district still has more Chromebooks to share! Students Grades Kindergarten-2 can pick-up Chromebooks at the drive-through at Windham High School (355 High Street) the following times: Wednesday, April 8 from 3-5PM and Thursday, April 9 from 8-10AM.
Students Grades 3-12 who have not yet picked up Chromebooks can do so at Central Office (355 High Street, Unit B) Monday April 6 through Thursday April 9 from 7:30AM to 3:30PM.
---

shared_text:
Connecticut Invention Convention
March 25 at 6:02 PM ·

Save lives and keep people safe with Wyndham 6th grader Hannah Kravet’s Bodyguard Binder. Her invention uses Kevlar, grommets that attach to a three ring binder, and handles “to hold it like a shield to keep safe”. Hannah is one of our contestants for the Inventor of the Year Award. Like, comment and share to help your favorite inventor to the top prize!

The meeting will also be recorded for review following the meeting on the district's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nlDMZs026JQ

post_text:
Windham High School students and families: Please come to WHS now to pick up Chromebook, if you have internet access. Printed packets of materials are also available so everyone can begin Schooling at Home! WHS Auditorium entrance until 10 AM today!
---
Estudiantes y familias de la Escuela Superior de Windham: Vengan a WHS ahora para recoger un Chromebook, si tienen acceso a internet. ¡También hay paquetes impresos de materiales disponibles para que todos puedan comenzar a estudiar en casa! ¡Entrada al Auditorio WHS hasta las 10 AM hoy!
shared_text:
Windham High School
March 24 at 2:18 PM ·

Hello Windham High School Families,

This is Mrs. Cavanagh, Dr. Morales, and Mr. Risley,

It was so nice to see many of you this morning at WHS! We passed out 136 Chromebooks to our students and written materials also.

We will also be distributing Chromebooks and written materials tomorrow at WHS from 8:00-10:00 am so that students will be ready for our home learning phase which begins on March 30th. Our WHS students will use Google Classrooms online or complete written materials if they do not yet have internet access. Charter Spectrum is offering free Wi-Fi to residents who do not yet have internet. For information, please call Charter at 1-844-488-8395.

Students, we are celebrating Spirit Week on our School Instagram. We hope you join the fun and connect with one another!

We will continue to update you each week.

Thank you and Take Care.

Check out the latest update from Dr. Youngberg regarding Schooling at Home. Per Governor Lamont, the earliest schools can reopen is Monday, April 20th. Please be sure to continue social distancing, handwashing, and sanitizing surfaces that are frequently touched.
--- https://www.windhamps.org/apps/pages/index.jsp?uREC_ID=1703315&type=d&pREC_ID=1865377
Eche un vistazo a la última actualización de la Dra. Youngberg sobre la Educación en el Hogar. Según el Gobernador Lamont, lo más temprano que las escuelas pueden reabrir es el lunes 20 de abril. Por favor asegúrese de continuar el distanciamiento social, el lavado de manos, y la desinfección de superficies que se tocan con frecuencia.

--- https://www.windhamps.org/apps/pages/index.jsp?uREC_ID=1703315&type=d&pREC_ID=1865377
Eche un vistazo a la última actualización de la Dra. Youngberg sobre la Educación en el Hogar. Según el Gobernador Lamont, lo más temprano que las escuelas pueden reabrir es el lunes 20 de abril. Por favor asegúrese de continuar el distanciamiento social, el lavado de manos, y la desinfección de superficies que se tocan con frecuencia.

WINDHAMPS.ORG
COVID-19 Updates / Actualizaciones de COVID-19 – COVID-19 Updates / Actualizaciones de COVID-19 – Windham Public Schools

post_text:
Everyone is learning in new ways during this time. Teachers are coordinating their schools' Schooling at Home plans by teleconference, for example, including these North Windham School Grades Kindergarten-1 Compañeros teachers meeting together from home. Whatever it takes to get our Windham students back in the learning mode as soon as we can!
--- Compañeros & Dos Ríos
Todos estamos aprendiendo de nuevas maneras durante este tiempo. Los maestros están coordinando los planes de Educación en el Hogar de sus escuelas por teleconferencia, por ejemplo, incluyendo a estos maestros de la Escuela North Windham Grados Kindergarten-1 Compañeros reunidos juntos desde casa. ¡Lo que sea necesario para que nuestros estudiantes de Windham vuelvan al modo de aprendizaje tan pronto como podamos!

Our teachers are eager to engage our student’s in their learning from home during this school closing! Many Windham Early Childhood Center Teachers are reading to you and your family – here is Ms. Anu reading “Caps for Sale.”
Find more videos of our Windham Early Childhood Center teachers reading here: https://ecc.windhamps.org/apps/pages/index.jsp?uREC_ID=1695044&type=d&pREC_ID=1854430

¡Nuestros maestros están entusiasmados por involucrar a nuestros estudiantes en su aprendizaje desde casa mientras las escuelas están cerradas! Muchos maestros del Centro de Primera Infancia de Windham están leyendo para usted y a su familia – aquí está la Sra. Anu leyendo “Caps for Sale” (“Gorras a la venta”).
Encuentra más videos de nuestros maestros del Centro de Primera Infancia de Windham leyendo aquí: https://ecc.windhamps.org/apps/pages/index.jsp?uREC_ID=1695044&type=d&pREC_ID=1854430

post_text:
Many families may be wondering what services are still open in town for purchasing food, handling banking, repairs, and more. Here is an update from businesses in Willimantic Downtown and Willimantic Renaissance, Inc., our good friends who bring us Willimantic's 3rd Thursday Street Fest, and many other great happenings in our community.

---
Muchas familias pueden estar preguntándose cuales servicios todavía están abiertos en el publow para comprar alimentos, manejar asuntos bancarios, reparaciones, y más. Aquí hay una actualización de las empresas en Willimantic Downtown y Willimantic Renaissance, nuestros buenos amigos que nos traen el Third Thursday y muchos otros grandes acontecimientos en nuestra comunidad.
shared_text:
Willimantic Renaissance, Inc.
March 19 at 10:36 AM ·

In unfamiliar times let’s embrace the familiar - like the first day of Spring! And let's be sure to embrace the businesses and organizations that make our community a home. Check out this list of who is doing what via Willimantic Downtown: www.willimanticdowntown.org/Downtown-Updates/
We hope you are all well and we look forward to seeing you soon! #FromWilliWithLove ️Photo Courtesy Winter Caplanson/ Connecticut Food and Farm

The Board of Education is holding a Special Meeting via conference call, and you can listen in, too! Call 860-465-2513 at 12 noon today, Thursday March 19. As with any BOE meeting, there will be an opportunity for Public Comment at the end of the meeting. Here is the agenda.
---
¡La Junta de Educación (BOE, por sus siglas en inglés) tendrá una reunión especial a través de una conferencia telefónica, y usted también puede escuchar! Llame al 860-465-2513 a las 12 del mediodía de hoy, jueves 19 de marzo. Al igual que con cualquier reunión de BOE, habrá una oportunidad para comentarios públicos al final de la reunión. Aquí está la agenda.

post_text:
Charter Spectrum, a local provider, is offering free high-speed internet service and a Wi-Fi connection to families for 60 days who do not currently have service so that students can access learning resources at home while schools are closed. To enroll call 1-844-488-8395. Installation fees will be waived for new student households.
--- https://www.windhamps.org/apps/news/article/1188883
Charter Spectrum, un proveedor local, ofrece un servicio gratuito de internet de alta velocidad y una conexión wi-fi por 60 días que a las familias que actualmente no tienen servicio para que los estudiantes puedan acceder a los recursos de aprendizaje en el hogar mientras las escuelas están cerradas. Para inscribirse llame al 1-844-488-8395. Las tarifas de instalación no se aplicarán a los nuevos hogares de estudiantes.
North Windham School Windham High School Natchaug School Windham Middle School Charles H. Barrows STEM Academy W.B. Sweeney Elementary School

post_text:
We are happy to share this editorial from Monday's The Chronicle, Windham's local newspaper, about the progress Windham schools are making in student achievement, giving special shout-out to Windham Center School for being named a School of Distinction for high growth! The editorial points out the impact, and the need for, adequate resources for students.
---
¡Nos complace compartir este editorial del The Chronicle de este lunes, el periódico local de Windham, sobre el progreso que las escuelas de Windham están haciendo en el logro de los estudiantes, dando un agradecimiento especial a la Escuela Windham Center por ser nombrada una Escuela de Distinción por su alto crecimiento! El editorial señala el impacto y la necesidad de recursos adecuados para los estudiantes.

--- https://www.windhamps.org/apps/news/article/1183507
¡Sol, lluvia, o nieve, nuestro personal de Servicios de Alimentos están distribuyendo comidas a cualquier niño hasta 18 años! Queremos asegurarnos de que todos los estudiantes estén bien alimentados mientras las escuelas estén cerradas. Siga el enlace para ubicaciones, horarios, y más información. #SomosWindham

post_text:
The Board of Education and Acting Superintendent Dr. Youngberg will NOT be presenting the Recommended Budget before the Board of Finance at Wednesday's meeting, as originally planned. Watch for details on when that will be rescheduled. If you have not yet read the Recommended Budget, please take the time to do so. We want our community to easily find the information about what is proposed to operate our schools in the coming year.
--- https://4.files.edl.io/8e9d/03/13/20/201052-268d1352-a478-4d6a-8faf-09f565574b34.pdf?fbclid=IwAR1YkrboUshkwbNu9qW6srB7HWAteCjG5YDXKCHQhOGyc2T2lUPJj_P5TB8
La Junta de Educación y la Superintendente Provisional, la Dra. Youngberg, NO presentarán el Presupuesto Recomendado ante la Junta de Finanzas en la reunión del miércoles, según lo planeado originalmente. Esté atento a los detalles sobre cuándo se reprogramará esto. Si aún no ha leído el Presupuesto Recomendado, por favor tome el tiempo para hacerlo. Queremos que nuestra comunidad encuentre fácilmente la información sobre lo que se propone para operar nuestras escuelas en el próximo año.

post_text:
This is great news about Connecticut's top male athlete of the year, and Windham's own Alfonso Vazquez! According to his soccer coach, Zachary Konopka, "Alfonso wanted me to share with everyone how thankful and grateful he is of everyone at the school who has helped and supported him for the past 4 years!" Best of luck in your professional career!

---
¡Esta es una gran noticia sobre el atleta masculino más importante del año de Connecticut, nuestro propio Alfonso Vázquez de Windham! Según su entrenador de fútbol, Zachary Konopka, "¡Alfonso quería que compartiera con todos lo agradecido que está con todos en la escuela que lo han ayudado y apoyado durante los últimos 4 años!” ¡Mucha suerte en tu carrera profesional!
shared_text:
Windham High School
March 11 at 4:58 PM ·

Congratulations Alfonso! We are so proud of you!

post_text:
COVID-19 UPDATE: Windham Public Schools will be cancelling large events and field trips that occur between tomorrow Thursday, March 12 and Friday, March 27. We have also decided to cancel our Parent & Community University on April 4. You will hear directly from your child’s school about the cancellation of specific school activities. Refer to our district website for information and resources from health authorities. Our first priority is student safety.
--- https://www.windhamps.org/apps/news/article/1162193
ACTUALIZACIÓN DE COVID-19: Las Escuelas Públicas de Windham cancelarán eventos y excursiones grandes que se llevarán a cabo entre mañana el jueves 12 de marzo y el viernes 27 de marzo. También hemos decidido cancelar nuestra Universidad de Padres y Comunidad el 4 de abril. Usted aprenderá directamente de la escuela de su hijo sobre la cancelación de específicas actividades escolares. Consulte el sitio web de nuestro distrito para obtener más información y recursos de las autoridades de salud. Nuestra primera prioridad es la seguridad de nuestros estudiantes.

post_text:
My name is Evolet, and I am a third grade student at Natchaug School. I want to be a writer, and I have two journals that I use to write. I like to write about my life and what happens to me. This year my class worked with STORYLINE. Meeting Ms. Barbara McClintock, a famous children’s book illustrator, made me want to continue to write my stories. I write a couple of times a week. #WeareWindham. We are #WindhamPublicSchools.
---
Mi nombre es Evolet, y yo soy una estudiante de tercer grado en la Escuela Primaria Natchaug. Quiero ser escritora y tengo dos diarios que uso para escribir. Me gusta escribir sobre mi vida y lo que me pasa. Este año mi clase trabajó con STORYLINE. Conocer a la Sra. Barbara McClintock, una famosa ilustradora de libros para niños, me hizo querer seguir escribiendo mis historias. Escribo un par de veces a la semana. #SomosWindham. Somos las #EscuelasPúblicasdeWindham.

post_text:
Natchaug School students are learning so much about science with the reef tank there!
---
¡Los estudiantes de la Escuela Natchaug están aprendiendo mucho sobre ciencias con el tanque de arrecife allí!
shared_text:
Charles Grillo‎Natchaug Elementary School Gets a Reef Tank
January 31 at 9:04 PM ·

Well after successfully culturing rotifers using Reef Nutrition’s CCS system for a week, we decided to hand over yet another job to Mrs. Jara’s 5th grade class students. I love the way they eagerly take on their jobs free of fear. The “How to” video from Reef Nutrition and the quick responses back from our questions by Chad Clayton made it a breeze. As you can see, the kiddos enjoy their new job. Now if only our Clarkii clownfish keep cooperating! It’s not just about a fish tank 😀🐠.

What do you know about Windham High School today? In an effort to inform Board and community members about what's happening in our schools, Windham Public Schools will be featuring a presentation by the Principal of each of its schools at upcoming Board of Education meetings.
On January 22, Acting Principal Pamela Cavanagh provided an overview of Windham High School. On February 12, Windham Middle School will be featured.
---
¿Qué sabe sobre la Escuela Superior de Windham hoy? En un esfuerzo pora informar a la Junta y a los miembros de la comunidad sobre lo que está sucediendo en nuestras escuelas, las Escuelas Públicas de Windham presentarán una presentación del Director de cada una de sus escuelas en las próximas reuniones de la Junta de Educación.
El 22 de enero, la directora interina Pamela Cavanagh proporcionó una descripción general de la Escuela Superior de Windham. El 12 de febrero, se presentará la Escuela Intermedia de Windham.

post_text:
Our annual Three Kings’ Day Cultural Celebration will be taking place tomorrow Saturday, January 11 from 11am-2pm! The celebration at Windham High School's Cafeteria will feature music, a luncheon, information, and fun activities. The Three Kings will be there to give gifts for children ages 0-15. Please remember that children must be present to receive a gift. See you tomorrow at 11am for our Three Kings’ Day Cultural Celebration.
--- https://www.windhamps.org/apps/news/article/1129010
¡Nuestra celebración Cultural anual de los Tres Reyes Magos se llevará a cabo mañana sábado 11 de enero, de 11am-2pm! La celebración en la Cafetería de la Escuela Superior de Windham tendrá música, almuerzo, información, y actividades divertidas. Los Reyes Magos estarán ahí para dar regalos a niños de 0 a 15 años. Favor recuerde que los niños deben estar presentes para recibir un regalo. Nos vemos mañana a las 11am para nuestra Celebración Cultural de los Tres Reyes Magos.

post_text:
Learning to type is a very important skill in our current digital culture.
---
Aprender a mecanografiar es una habilidad muy importante en nuestra cultura digital actual.
shared_text:
W.B. Sweeney Elementary School
December 12, 2019 at 11:35 PM ·

Learning to type is a very important skill in our current digital culture! Students need to type to answer open-ended questions on tests, complete written assignments and to communicate. In Kindergarten and First Grade students learn where the letters are. In Second Grade, students begin touch typing with proper finger placement. This Second Grader is already doing an awesome job and has her hands right where they should be - the home row!

All students can access Typing.com and other typing games and activities by going to Clever and clicking on Mrs. Sykes page.

Small empanadillas are for $2.00, and large ones are for $3.00. They are also taking orders of 6 for $12.00 and of 12 for $24.00. Please e-mail tNorman@windham.k12.ct.us and mOrtiz@windham.k12.ct.us to place your order one week in advance.

Who else is already ready for the Lock-In for Literacy & Culture?

¿Quién más ya está listo para el “Lock-In” para Alfabetismo y Cultura?
shared_text:
YOUTUBE.COM
Lock in 2020

Windham High School
December 5, 2019 at 9:44 PM ·

Today, the Write Idea Writing Tutors introduced this year’s Lock-In for Literacy & Culture. Students in every Advisory class were given forms to register for the ninth annual overnight, in-school literacy event, and to order books written by this year’s featured author, Jenny Torres Sanchez. They were also shown a video offering an overview of the Lock-In as well as the steps to register for the event. If your Windham High School student needs a form, Mrs. Bowling has them in room 101. If they have any questions, please have them ask Mrs. Bowling or a Write Idea tutor.

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=eg4o1VPjs-Y&feature=youtu.be

Windham High School Culinary students in Ms. Fluherty’s class have freedom to experiment and make exciting recipes, such as fried Oreos! Teachers have the very important job of taste testing student creations. Students also learn to make basics like toasted sandwiches, cookies, and pasta.
---
Los estudiantes de culinaria de la Escuela Superior de Windham en la clase de la Sra. Fluherty tienen libertad para experimentar y hacer recetas interesantes, como los Oreos fritos. Los maestros tienen el trabajo muy importante de probar las creaciones de los estudiantes. Los estudiantes también aprenden a crear lo básico como sándwiches tostados, galletas, y pasta.

post_text:
(2/3)
Windham Middle School Compañeros celebrates Thanksgiving!
--- Compañeros & Dos Ríos
¡Compañeros en la Escuela Intermedia de Windham celebra Acción de Gracias!
shared_text:
Compañeros & Dos Ríos
November 28, 2019 at 8:02 PM ·

(3/3)
Las familias de Compañeros en la Escuela Intermedia de Windham se unieron para dar premios a los estudiantes por sus logros académicos y compartir una fiesta con alegría. Antes de la ceremonia, los estudiantes participaron en los Juegos Olímpicos en su salón hogar. Los estudiantes hicieron diferentes retos, como el reto del bote de papel de aluminio (el record fue a un equipo que pudo flotar más de 60 chavos), para aprender a resolver problemas y desarrollar habilidades cooperativas de trabajar en equipo. ¡Feliz acción de gracias a todos de nuestra familia de Compañeros!
---
Windham Middle School Compañeros families came together to award students for their academic achievements and share a feast with laughter. Before the ceremony, students participated in Homeroom Olympics. Students did different challenges, such as the aluminum foil boat challenge (the record went to a team that floated over 60 pennies!), to learn how to problem solve and develop cooperative team working skills. Happy Thanksgiving everyone from our Compañeros family!

Have you seen the Neighbors Paper December issue yet? Check out page 12 about our move to biodegradable trays in our cafeterias. This change will save 800,000 polystyrene trays from going into landfills each year. The district serves 7,000 breakfasts and 14,000 lunches each week to Windham students.
---
¿Usted ha visto la edición de diciembre del Periódico “Neighbors” (Vecinos)? Eche un vistazo la página 12 y aprenda sobre nuestro cambio a bandejas biodegradables en nuestras cafeterías. Este cambio evitará que 800,000 bandejas de poliestireno ingresen a los vertederos cada año. El distrito sirve 7,000 desayunos y 14,000 almuerzos cada semana a los estudiantes de Windham.

post_text:
Scholarship opportunities for Seniors!
---
¡Oportunidades de becas para estudiantes de 12o grado!
shared_text:
Windham High School
November 22, 2019 at 8:57 AM ·

2020 New England Red Sox Service Scholarship Program is now live and will be awarding an on-time $1,000 scholarship to graduating high school seniors attending each of the 59 public high schools selected based on 1) Demonstrated Community Service, 2) Academic Performance and 3) Eligibility for Financial Aid. This scholarship award is for those pursuing a two or four-year degree at any college, or university in the fall, 2020.

Application is now live at www.redsoxfoundation.org/servicescholarships

Each student must enter an access code to begin the online application. Access code for students attending selected schools in Connecticut is RICTVT2020.

Incomplete application (i.e. missing transcript, letter of recommendation and other required materials) and applications will not be reviewed by the Committee - no exceptions.

Scholarship opportunities for Seniors!

This scholarship award is for those pursuing a two or four-year degree at any college, or university in the fall, 2020.

Application is now live at www.redsoxfoundation.org/servicescholarships

Each student must enter an access code to begin the online application. Access code for students attending selected schools in Connecticut is RICTVT2020.

Incomplete application (i.e. missing transcript, letter of recommendation and other required materials) and applications will not be reviewed by the Committee - no exceptions.

post_text:
It is never too late to donate winter wear!
---
¡Nunca es demasiado tarde para donar ropa de invierno!
shared_text:
Jessica Martínez
November 20, 2019 at 6:30 PM ·

Hi everyone!

I am currently a Student Leader at the Center for Community Engagement at ECSU, and I oversee a Mentoring Program at Windham High School, where there’s a high need for coats,gloves, scarfs and/or any kind of winter clothing.

If anyone is interested in helping out let me know. We will truly appreciate it!

For more info you can contact me through text, email or DM!
text:
It is never too late to donate winter wear!
---
¡Nunca es demasiado tarde para donar ropa de invierno!

Jessica Martínez
November 20, 2019 at 6:30 PM ·

Hi everyone!

I am currently a Student Leader at the Center for Community Engagement at ECSU, and I oversee a Mentoring Program at Windham High School, where there’s a high need for coats,gloves, scarfs and/or any kind of winter clothing.

If anyone is interested in helping out let me know. We will truly appreciate it!

For more info you can contact me through text, email or DM!

November 25, 2019 at 1:52 PM ·

El mes pasado, los estudiantes de la Escuela Intermedia de Windham en Compañeros de 7º grado tuvieron una excursión al Bosque Estatal James L. Goodwin. Los estudiantes desarrollaron habilidades para trabajar en equipo y aprendieron sobre la naturaleza – ¡incluso tuvieron la oportunidad de encender su propio fuego usando diferentes técnicas!
--- Friends of Goodwin Forest
Last month, Windham Middle School 7th grade Compañeros students went on a field trip to the James L. Goodwin State Forest. Students developed skills to work as a team and learned about nature – they even had the opportunity to build their own fire using different techniques!

Tonight at 6PM there will be a Town Meeting on the upcoming referendum for the Board of Education and Town of Windham budgets. Please mark your calendar to Vote on Tuesday, December 3. The school budget is at 0% increase - the Minimum Budget Requirement or MBR. Here’s what that means:
--- http://ctschoolfinance.org/resources/uploads/files/Minimum-Budget-Requirement.pdf
Esta noche a las 6PM habrá una Reunión del Pueblo sobre el próximo referéndum para los presupuestos de la Junta de Educación y de la Ciudad de Windham. Marque su calendario para votar el martes 3 de diciembre. El presupuesto escolar aumenta 0%: el requisito de presupuesto mínimo o MBR. Esto es lo que eso significa:

post_text:
Windham High School students who take part in the Attendance Mentoring Program receive monthly awards for good attendance. Last month, students were treated to a walking tour of Eastern Connecticut State University. They visited a dorm room, the cafeteria, the Communications Department, and lecture halls. They also had the opportunity to talk to college students.
---
Los estudiantes de la Escuela Superior de Windham que forman parte del Programa de Mentoría de Asistencia reciben premios mensuales por buena asistencia. El mes pasado, los estudiantes fueron invitados a un recorrido a pie por la Universidad Estatal del Este de Connecticut. Visitaron un dormitorio, la cafetería, el Departamento de Comunicaciones y salas de conferencias. También tuvieron la oportunidad de hablar con estudiantes universitarios.

Felicitaciones a nuestro destacado padre voluntario Kim Swart, cuyo apoyo a las Escuelas de Windham nunca se detiene. Fue reconocida ayer en el Capitolio del Estado, nominada por la Escuela Superior de Windham, donde sirve en su Consejo de Gobierno Escolar.
shared_text:
SERC - State Education Resource Center of CT is at Connecticut State Capitol.
November 21, 2019 at 2:13 PM · Hartford, CT ·

Congratulations to our 2019 Parental Involvement Recognition Award winners! We held the ceremony in the North Lobby of the State Capitol, a fittingly stately setting for these parent leaders: Sally Ajello of Bethel; Regan Allan of Stamford; Anita Crawford of Windsor; Dominie Dickens of East Hartford; Yadira Esquivel of Stamford; Elizabeth Quinonez of Danbury; Dawn & Tom Shumbo of Colchester; Lizzette Smith of East Hartford; Kim Swart of Windham; and Antoinette Terenzio of Westerly, RI.
#CTParentAwards #NationalParentalInvolvementDay

post_text:
Thank you to Eastern Connecticut State University volunteers for this wonderful event.
---
Gracias a los voluntarios de la Universidad Estatal del Este de Connecticut por este evento.
shared_text:
Natchaug School
October 29, 2019 at 1:03 PM ·

The Eastern Education Club is a group of inspiring teachers that go to Eastern Connecticut State University. Each year they come to Natchaug to do an event called Read-A-Thon. During this event the Eastern students read to the kids and have multiple fun and engaging activities for the students to participate in. This year the theme was Space and the kids were each able to take home 2-3 books to encourage reading at home. Natchaug School is so lucky to have such a great partnership with Eastern Connecticut State University.

Thank you to Eastern Connecticut State University volunteers for this wonderful event.

Join us at Windham High School Media Center at 6:30 PM tonight, Wednesday November 13, prior to the Board of Education meeting, or stop in at North Windham School on Friday morning, November 15, from 9 to 10 AM.

To all our Windham Middle School Grade 8 families - please remember to stop by the WMS gymnasium today from 5 to 7PM to meet representatives from Windham High School, and other local schools. Learn what great programs are available at Windham High School including Windham Early College Opportunity, a continued focus on world languages, plus clubs, organizations, and athletics.
---
Para todas nuestras familias de Grado 8 de la Escuela Intermedia de Windham: recuerden de pasar por el gimnasio de WMS hoy de 5 a 7 PM para reunirse con representantes de la Escuela Superior de Windham y otras escuelas locales. Conozca los excelentes programas disponibles en la Escuela superior de Windham, incluyendo Oportunidad Universitaria Temprana de Windha, un enfoque continuo en los idiomas mundiales, además de clubes, organizaciones, y atletismo.

post_text:
Stop by Windham Middle School Saturday November 9 from 11am-12pm for the School Farmers Market. Bring your own reusable bag for 40 pounds of food at no cost! You do not need to prove income or residency. Last month we broke 250 people – let’s see if we can beat that number this month. Thank you to the Connecticut Food Bank for working with us to distribute healthy, fresh food to our community.
--- https://www.windhamps.org/apps/news/article/1087164
Pase por la Escuela Intermedia de Windham mañana sábado 9 de noviembre de 11am-12pm para el Mercado Agrícola Escolar. ¡Traiga su propia bolsa reusable para 40 libras de comida! El mes pasado servimos a más de 250 personas – vamos a ver si podemos superar ese número mañana. Gracias al Banco de Alimentos de CT por trabajar con nosotros para distribuir alimentos frescos y saludables a nuestra comunidad.

post_text:
DUE TO THE SCHOOL CLOSING, THIS EVENT HAS BEEN POSTPONED TO NEXT FRIDAY, NOVEMBER 8 - Come out and cheer on this spirited competition Friday afternoon. With joy and open hearts, the Windham High School Girls Volleyball Team is hosting the Dig Pink tournament to raise funds for breast cancer research. Don't forget to wear pink – or buy a shirt when you get there!
---
DEBIDO AL CIERRE ESCOLAR, ESTE EVENTO SE HA POSPONIDO AL PRÓXIMO VIERNES 8 DE NOVIEMBRE - Ven y anima esta animada competencia el viernes por la tarde. Con alegría y corazones abiertos, el Equipo de Voleibol de Niñas de la Escuela Superior de Windham está organizando el torneo Dig Pink para recaudar fondos para la investigación del cáncer de seno. ¡No se olvide de vestirse en rosado – o compre una camisa cuando llegues allí!
shared_text:
Windham High School
October 30, 2019 at 7:27 AM ·

To donate online, please follow the link https://giving.side-out.org/campaigns/16119#/
To donate by check or cash, please write check to WHS with Dig Pink in memo section. Please write in care of Michelle Daleb at Windham High School on envelopes.
Tax forms are available upon request
There will be raffle items, a 50-50 raffle, a huge concession stand and several volleyball teams: Varsity team, a staff team, an alumni team and a breast cancer survivors team.
If you are interested in donating any goods or services for the raffle call:
Michelle Daleb
mDaleb@windham.k12.ct.us
Work number 860 465 2417
Cell number 772 486 2635

post_text:
Are you making plans for your family fun this weekend? Stop by CLiCK Willimantic on Club Road on Saturday to carve a pumpkin to take home, plus enjoy lots of fun and treats! (Then you can enter your pumpkin in the contest on Thursday at Trick or Treat on Main Street!)
---
¿Está haciendo planes para que su familia se divierta este fin de semana? Pase por CLiCK en Club Road el sábado para tallar una calabaza para llevar a casa, ¡y disfrute de mucha diversión y golosinas! (¡Entonces puede ingresar su calabaza en el concurso el jueves en Truco o Trato en Main Street!)
text:
Are you making plans for your family fun this weekend? Stop by CLiCK Willimantic on Club Road on Saturday to carve a pumpkin to take home, plus enjoy lots of fun and treats! (Then you can enter your pumpkin in the contest on Thursday at Trick or Treat on Main Street!)
---
¿Está haciendo planes para que su familia se divierta este fin de semana? Pase por CLiCK en Club Road el sábado para tallar una calabaza para llevar a casa, ¡y disfrute de mucha diversión y golosinas! (¡Entonces puede ingresar su calabaza en el concurso el jueves en Truco o Trato en Main Street!)

Members of the Windham High School Football team spent part of their long weekend helping Faith Kenton of the 325 Trees Committee in Windham with planting and landscaping. Thanks, Coach Randall Prose and Natchaug Teacher Beth Prose, for coordinating this great effort, and to our students for pitching in with spirit and muscles to help beautify the community.
---
Miembros del equipo de fútbol de la Escuela Superior de Windham pasaron parte de su fin de semana largo ayudando a Faith Kenton del Comité de 325 Árboles en Windham a plantar y ajardinar. Gracias al entrenador Randall Prose y a la maestra de Natchaug Beth Prose por coordinar este gran esfuerzo, y gracias a nuestros estudiantes por contribuir con espíritu y músculos para ayudar a embellecer la comunidad.

post_text:
A useful opportunity:
---
Una oportunidad útil:
shared_text:
PARENTCENTERHUB.ORG
Partners in Education | Online Module | Center for Parent Information and Resources

Connecticut Parent Advocacy Center, Inc.
July 31, 2019 at 4:51 AM ·

This 3-hour self-directed course was created to help parents of children with developmental disabilities understand and maximize the special education system. The course focuses on:

- A child’s right to a free appropriate public education (FAPE),
- the laws that protect those rights, and
practical ways that parents can ensure that their children benefit from an inclusive education.

The course reviews IDEA 2004 and includes current thinking on educational reform and the importance of teaching children to use digital technology to improve educational outcomes and better prepare children to work in the future.

Click on the links below:

English module | http://partnersonlinecourses.com/partners-in-education

Spanish module | http://www.mn.gov/mnddc/pipm/education-sp

https://www.parentcenterhub.org/partners-in-education-online-module/

October 2 from 9am-12pm Grade 3-5 will have the “Fire Simulator Trailer”

Science in action!
---
¡La ciencia en acción!
shared_text:
Charles Grillo‎Natchaug Elementary School Gets a Reef Tank
September 18, 2019 at 8:54 PM ·

In Mrs. Jara’s fifth grade class, the kiddos have been learning how corals battle for space on the reef. This afternoon in science, the class received hands on learning about just how corals do this by handling corals seeing exactly how some coral can spread over others to block out the sun. These are 10 year old kiddos getting an appreciation for just what goes on in our fragile reefs. To me, this is priceless 😍. It’s not just about a fish tank 😀🐠.

Science in action!
---
¡La ciencia en acción!
shared_text:
Charles Grillo‎Natchaug Elementary School Gets a Reef Tank
September 11, 2019 at 6:58 PM ·

In Mrs. Hara’s 5th grade classroom today, we started something new this year. We call it wet Wednesdays 😀. Today I hand pruned some macroalgae off our rocks and showed the kiddos just what lives in there. You can tell by their faces they really enjoyed the bristleworms, snails and starfish. They loved touching everything,everything except of course the bristleworms which were off limits. Thank you all again for following our kiddos as they learn all about our amazing reefs! It’s not just about a fish tank 😀🐠.

Have you purchased your tickets for the Harlem Wizards vs. the Thread City Titans game yet? The game is next Friday, September 27 at Windham High School. All proceeds benefit our Windham Public School students through the amazing Parent-Teacher Organizations across the district. Get your tickets tonight at Willimantic's 3rd Thursday Street Fest at the Windham Public Schools exhibit tent at Main and Bank Street, or at East Brook Mall near Kohl's this Saturday from 12 noon to 3 PM.
---
¿Usted ya compro sus boletos para el juego Harlem Wizards vs. los Thread City Titans? El juego es el próximo viernes 27 de septiembre en la Escuela Superior de Windham. Todas las ganancias benefician a nuestros estudiantes de las Escuelas Públicas de Windham a través de las increíbles organizaciones de padres y maestros en todo el distrito. Obtenga sus boletos esta noche en Third Thursday en la carpa de exhibición de las Escuelas Públicas de Windham en Main y Bank Street, o en Eastbrook Mall cerca de Kohl's este sabado de las 12-3PM.

Barrows STEM Academy, 141 Tuckie Rd., North Windham from 8:30-9:30am for an informal discussion or questions on any topic concerning the district. This opportunity will be held each month across the school district through April.
